description.english: Become Embraced into the Brujah clan.
description.german: Empfang die Umarmung durch Clan Brujah.
description.french: Être étreint en tant que membre du clan Brujah.
description.italian: Fatti abbracciare dal clan Brujah.
description.spanish: Sé Abrazado por el clan Brujah.
description.schinese: 接受初拥，加入布鲁然氏族。
description.russian: Пройти Становление в клан Бруха.
description.brazilian: Receber o Abraço do Clã Brujah.

description.english: Become Embraced into the Toreador clan.
description.german: Empfang die Umarmung durch Clan Toreador.
description.french: Être étreint en tant que membre du clan Toréador.
description.italian: Fatti abbracciare dal clan Toreador.
description.spanish: Sé Abrazado por el clan Toreador.
description.schinese: 接受初拥，加入妥芮朵氏族。
description.russian: Пройти Становление в клан Тореадор.
description.brazilian: Receber o Abraço do Clã Toreador.

description.english: Become Embraced into the Ventrue clan.
description.german: Empfang die Umarmung durch Clan Ventrue.
description.french: Être étreinte en tant que membre du clan Ventrue.
description.italian: Fatti abbracciare dal clan Ventrue.
description.spanish: Sé Abrazada por el clan Ventrue.
description.schinese: 接受初拥，加入梵卓氏族。
description.russian: Пройти Становление в клан Вентру.
description.brazilian: Receber o Abraço do Clã Ventrue.

description.english: Fail to recruit somebody into your coterie.
description.german: Scheitere bei dem Versuch, jemanden für deine Koterie zu gewinnen.
description.french: Échouez à recruter quelqu'un dans votre coterie.
description.italian: Fallisci nel tentativo di reclutare qualcuno nella ua coterie.
description.spanish: Fracasa a la hora de reclutar a alguien para tu coterie.
description.schinese: 未能成功将某人招募到集社。
description.russian: Вам не удалось завербовать кого-то в свою котерию.
description.brazilian: Falhar em recrutar alguém para sua coterie.

description.english: Convince Agathon to cooperate with you.
description.german: Überzeuge Agathon, sich mit dir zusammenzutun.
description.french: Convaincre Agathon de coopérer avec vous.
description.italian: Convinci Agathon a collaborare con te.
description.spanish: Convence a Agathon de que coopere contigo.
description.schinese: 说服阿伽松与你合作。
description.russian: Убедить Агатона работать вместе.
description.brazilian: Convencer Agathon a cooperar com você.

description.english: Convince D'Angelo to cooperate with you.
description.german: Überzeuge D'Angelo, sich mit dir zusammenzutun.
description.french: Convaincre D'Angelo de coopérer avec vous.
description.italian: Convinci D'Angelo a collaborare con te.
description.spanish: Convence a D'Angelo para que coopere contigo.
description.schinese: 说服德安吉洛与你合作。
description.russian: Убедить Д'Анжело работать вместе.
description.brazilian: Convencer D'Angelo a cooperar com você.

description.english: Convince Hope to cooperate with you.
description.german: Überzeuge Hope, sich mit dir zusammenzutun.
description.french: Convaincre Hope de coopérer avec vous.
description.italian: Convinci Hope a collaborare con te.
description.spanish: Convence a Hope de que coopere contigo.
description.schinese: 说服霍普与你合作。
description.russian: Убедить Хоуп работать вместе.
description.brazilian: Convencer Hope a cooperar com você.

description.english: Convince Tamika to cooperate with you.
description.german: Überzeuge Tamika, sich mit dir zusammenzutun.
description.french: Convaincre Tamika de coopérer avec vous.
description.italian: Convinci Tamika a collaborare con te.
description.spanish: Convence a Tamika para que coopere contigo.
description.schinese: 说服塔米卡与你合作。
description.russian: Убедить Тамику работать вместе.
description.brazilian: Convencer Tamika a cooperar com você.

description.english: Complete Agathon's questline.
description.german: Schließe Agathons Geschichte ab.
description.french: Achever la suite de quêtes d'Agathon.
description.italian: Completa la questline di Agathon.
description.spanish: Completa la ruta de Agathon.
description.schinese: 完成阿伽松的任务线。
description.russian: Завершить квест Агатона.
description.brazilian: Completar a história de Agathon.

description.german: Schließe D'Angelos Geschichte ab.
description.french: Achever la suite de quêtes de D'Angelo.
description.italian: Completa la questline di D'Angelo.
description.spanish: Completa la ruta de D'Angelo.
description.schinese: 完成德安吉洛的任务线。
description.russian: Завершить квест Д'Анжело.
description.brazilian: Completar a história de D'Angelo.

description.english: Complete Hope's questlline.
description.german: Schließe Hopes Geschichte ab.
description.french: Achever la suite de quêtes de Hope.
description.italian: Completa la questline di Hope.
description.spanish: Completa la ruta de Hope.
description.schinese: 完成霍普的任务线。
description.russian: Завершить квест Хоуп.
description.brazilian: Completar a história de Hope.

description.english: Complete Tamika's questline.
description.german: Schließe Tamikas Geschichte ab.
description.french: Achever la suite de quêtes de Tamika.
description.italian: Completa la questline di Tamika.
description.spanish: Completa la ruta de Tamika.
description.schinese: 完成塔米卡的任务线。
description.russian: Завершить квест Тамики.
description.brazilian: Completar a história de Tamika.

description.english: Complete Frank Dougherty's questline ("A Nosy Reporter").
description.german: Schließe Frank Doughertys Geschichte ab („Ein Neugieriger Reporter“).
description.french: Achever la suite de quêtes de Franck Dougherty.
description.italian: Completa la questline di Frank Dougherty. ("Un Giornalista Inopportuno").
description.spanish: Completa la misión de Frank Dougherty («Un reportero entrometido»).
description.schinese: 完成弗兰克·多尔蒂的任务线（讨厌的八卦记者）。
description.russian: Завершить квест Фрэнка Доэрти ("Неотвязный репортер").
description.brazilian: Completar a história de Frank Dougherty.

displayName.brazilian: A Cada Suspiro que Você Der

description.english: Complete Adelaide Davis' questline ("Somebody's Watching Me") as her latest obsession.
description.german: Schließe Adelaide Davis' Geschichte („Jemand Beobachtet Mich“) als ihre neueste Obsession ab.
description.french: Achever la suite d'Adelaide Davis en devenant sa nouvelle obsession.
description.italian: Completa la questline di Adelaide Davis ("Qualcuno Mi Sta Seguendo") come sua ultima ossessione.
description.spanish: Completa la misión de Adelaide Davis («Alguien me observa») como su última obsesión.
description.schinese: 作为阿德莱德·戴维斯的新欢完成她的任务线（有谁在监视我）。
description.russian: Завершить квест Аделаиды Дэвис ("За мной кто-то следит"), оставшись объектом ее одержимости.
description.brazilian: Completar a história de Adelaide Davis como sua mais recente obsessão.

description.english: Complete Adelaide Davis' questline ("Somebody's Watching Me") as her bitter foe.
description.german: Schließe Adelaide Davis' Geschichte („Jemand Beobachtet Mich“) als ihr Intimfeind ab.
description.french: Achever la suite d'Adelaide Davis en devenant son ennemi-e juré-e.
description.italian: Completa la questline di Adelaide Davis ("Qualcuno Mi Sta Seguend") come suo acerrimo nemico.
description.spanish: Completa la misión de Adelaide Davis («Alguien me observa») como su implacable rival.
description.schinese: 作为阿德莱德·戴维斯的宿敌完成她的任务线（有谁在监视我）。
description.russian: Завершить квест Аделаиды Дэвис ("За мной кто-то следит"), став ее врагом.
description.brazilian: Completar a história de Adelaide Davis como sua amarga inimiga.

description.english: Complete Benoit Segal's questline ("Faith and Myth").
description.german: Schließe Benoit Segals Geschichte ab („Glaube und Mythos“).
description.french: Achever la suite de quêtes de Benoit Segal.
description.italian: Completa la questline di Benoit Segal ("Fede E Mito").
description.spanish: Completa la misión de Benoit Segal («Fe y mito»).
description.schinese: 完成贝努瓦·西格尔的任务线（信仰和传说）。
description.russian: Завершить квест Бенуа Сегаля ("Вера и миф").
description.brazilian: Completar a história de Benoit Segal.

displayName.english: As Far As Your Legs Can Carry You
displayName.french: Aussi Loin Que Vos Jambes Vous Porteront
displayName.spanish: Hasta donde te puedan llevar las piernas

description.english: Try running away from Qadir during your trial.
description.german: Versuche bei deiner Verhandlung vor Qadir wegzulaufen.
description.french: Tentez de fuir Qadir pendant votre procès.
description.italian: Prova a scappare da Qadir durante il processo.
description.spanish: Intenta huir de Qadir durante tu juicio.
description.schinese: 在审判时试图逃离卡迪尔。
description.russian: Попытаться сбежать от Кадира во время суда.
description.brazilian: Tentar fugir de Qadir durante o julgamento.

displayName.brazilian: O Lado onde a Corda Arrebenta

description.english: Accept your fate in Elysium.
description.german: Füge dich im Elysium in dein Schicksal.
description.french: Acceptez votre destin à l'Elysium.
description.italian: Accetta il tuo destino nell'Elysium
description.spanish: Acepta tu destino en el Elíseo.
description.schinese: 在极乐世界接受自己的命运。
description.russian: Смириться со своей судьбой в Элизиуме.
description.brazilian: Aceitar seu destino no Elysium.

displayName.german: Wer Früher Schreit, Ist Länger Tot

description.english: Rage against your fate and complete the game with any character.
description.german: Hau dem Schicksal auf die Finger und schließ das Spiel mit einer der drei Figuren ab.
description.french: Révoltez-vous contre votre destin et finissez le jeu avec n'importe quel personnage.
description.italian: Rifiuta il tuo destino e finisci il gioco con un personaggio qualsiasi.
description.spanish: Enfréntate a tu destino y completa el juego con cualquier personaje.
description.schinese: 反抗命运，以任意角色完成游戏。
description.russian: Воспротивиться своей судьбе и завершить игру любым персонажем.
description.brazilian: Completar o jogo com qualquer personagem.

description.english: Agathon came to your help in the grand finale.
description.german: Agathon hat dir im großen Finale zur Seite gestanden.
description.french: Agathon est venu vous prêter main-forte au cours du grand final.
description.italian: Agathon è venuto ad aiutarti durante il gran finale.
description.spanish: Agathon acudió en tu ayuda en la gran final.
description.schinese: 阿伽松在最终章出手相助。
description.russian: Агатон пришел вам нам помощь в трудный час.
description.brazilian: Agathon veio te ajudar no final.

displayName.italian: Il Pericolo Fa Parte Del Mestiere

description.english: D'Angelo came to your help in the grand finale.
description.german: D'Angelo hat dir im großen Finale zur Seite gestanden.
description.french: D'Angelo est venu vous prêter main-forte au cours du grand final.
description.italian: D'Angelo è venuto ad aiutarti durante il gran finale.
description.spanish: D'Angelo acudió en tu ayuda en la gran final.
description.schinese: 德安吉洛在最终章出手相助。
description.russian: Д'Анжело пришел вам на помощь в трудный час.
description.brazilian: D'Angelo veio te ajudar no final.

displayName.brazilian: Esperança é a Última que Morre

description.english: Hope came to your help in the grand finale.
description.german: Hope hat dir im großen Finale zur Seite gestanden.
description.french: Hope est venue vous prêter main-forte au cours du grand final.
description.italian: Hope è venuta ad aiutarti durante il gran finale.
description.spanish: Hope acudió en tu ayuda en la gran final.
description.schinese: 霍普在最终章出手相助。
description.russian: Хоуп пришла вам на помощь в трудный час.
description.brazilian: Hope veio te ajudar no final.

description.english: Tamika came to your help in the grand finale.
description.german: Tamika hat dir im großen Finale zur Seite gestanden.
description.french: Tamika est venue vous prêter main-forte au cours du grand final.
description.italian: Tamika è venuta ad aiutarti durante il gran finale.
description.spanish: Tamika acudió en tu ayuda en la gran final.
description.schinese: 塔米卡在最终章出手相助。
description.russian: Тамика пришла вам нам помощь в трудный час.
description.brazilian: Tamika veio te ajudar no final.

displayName.english: A Face Only A Mother Could Love
displayName.german: Und Der Haifisch, Der Hat Zähne
displayName.french: Une Tête Que Seule Une Mère Pourrait Aimer
displayName.italian: Una Faccia Che Solo Una Madre Amerebbe
displayName.spanish: Un rostro que sólo una madre podría amar

description.english: Nobody came to your help in the grand finale. Except for...
description.german: Niemand hat dir im großen Finale zur Seite gestanden. Außer...
description.french: Personne n'est venu vous prêter main-forte au cours du grand final. À part...
description.italian: Nessuno è venuto ad aiutarti durante il gran finale.. Tranne...
description.spanish: Nadie acudió en tu ayuda en la gran final. Excepto por…
description.schinese: 最终章中没人来救你，除了……
description.russian: В трудный час вам на помощь не пришел никто. Ну, кроме...
description.brazilian: Ninguém veio te ajudar no final. Exceto por...

displayName.english: Like A Moth To An Old Flame
displayName.french: Tel Un Papillon Devant Une Flamme
displayName.italian: Come Una Falena Attratta Da Una Vecchia Fiamma
displayName.spanish: Como una polilla a una vieja llama

description.english: Meet somebody you used to know in life as the Brujah.
description.german: Triff jemanden, den du als Sterblicher gekannt hast, bevor du zum Brujah geworden bist.
description.french: Rencontrez quelqu'un que vous connaissiez de votre vivant en jouant le Brujah.
description.italian: Incontra qualcuno che hai conosciuto in vita come Brujah.
description.spanish: Reúnete como Brujah con alguien a quien solías conocer.
description.schinese: 作为布鲁然与生前的一位相识相遇。
description.russian: Встретить человека из прошлой жизни, играя за бруху.
description.brazilian: Encontrar alguém da sua vida mortal como Brujah.

displayName.french: Les Mots Qu'On Dit Avec Les Yeux
displayName.italian: Parole Che Non Ci Siamo Detti

description.english: Meet somebody you used to know in life as the Toreador.
description.german: Triff jemanden, den du als Sterblicher gekannt hast, bevor du zum Toreador geworden bist.
description.french: Rencontrez quelqu'un que vous connaissiez de votre vivant en jouant le Toréador.
description.italian: Incontra qualcuno che hai conosciuto in vita come Toreador.
description.spanish: Reúnete como Toreador con alguien a quien solías conocer.
description.schinese: 作为妥芮朵与生前的一位相识相遇。
description.russian: Встретить человека из прошлой жизни, играя за тореадора.
description.brazilian: Encontrar alguém da sua vida mortal como Toreador.

displayName.german: Betrachten Sie Das Als Meine Kündigung
displayName.italian: Considerala La Mia Lettera Di Dimissioni
displayName.spanish: Considere esta mi carta de renuncia

description.english: Meet somebody you used to know in life as the Ventrue.
description.german: Triff jemanden, den du als Sterbliche gekannt hast, bevor du zur Ventrue geworden bist.
description.french: Rencontrez quelqu'un que vous connaissiez de votre vivant en jouant la Ventrue.
description.italian: Incontra qualcuno che hai conosciuto in vita come Ventrue.
description.spanish: Reúnete como Ventrue con alguien a quien solías conocer.
description.schinese: 作为梵卓与生前的一位相识相遇。
description.russian: Встретить человека из прошлой жизни, играя за вентру.
description.brazilian: Encontrar alguém da sua vida mortal como Ventrue.

description.english: Complete the game with all three characters.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel mit allen drei Figuren ab.
description.french: Finir le jeu avec les trois personnages.
description.italian: Completa il gioco con tutti e tre i personaggi.
description.spanish: Completa el juego con los tres personajes.
description.schinese: 用全部三个角色完成游戏。
description.russian: Пройти игру за всех трех персонажей.
description.brazilian: Completar o jogo com todos os três personagens.
